column3:
まずは当店でタバンタ小麦 ヤギのバター
きび砂糖を お買い求めください
column4:
First, you'll want to buy Tabantha wheat,
goat butter, and cane sugar here at the
Slippery Falcon.

column3:
この3種とリンゴを一緒に料理すれば
アップルパイが できますよ～
リンゴの代わりに
別の物を入れても いいかも～？
column4:
Cook those ingredients with an apple
until the crust is a flaky golden brown
and the insides are gooey and delicious.
And for an added kick, try substituting
the apple with something else!

column3:
この3種に お好みの木の実
例えばどんぐりを加え料理すれば
美味しいナッツケーキの
出来上がりで～す♪
column4:
Toss these ingredients in a pot alongside
the nuts of your choice to make a tasty
nutcake! I prefer acorns myself.

column3:
まずは当店でタバンタ小麦と
きび砂糖を お買い求めください
column4:
First, you'll want to buy Tabantha wheat
and cane sugar here at the
Slippery Falcon!

column3:
これらと一緒にツルギバナナに熱を通すと
あげバナナの完成で～す♪
ツルギバナナは この辺では珍しい果物だけど
見かけたら是非挑戦してみてくださ～い
column4:
Then, just fry those up alongside some
mighty bananas! Mighty bananas are rare
in these parts, but this dish is worth it!
